simulator

Class BrailleCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.BrailleCell

  • class BrailleCell
extends java.lang.Object
    Model that holds the states of all eight pins on one braille cell. Each braille cell that exists on the screen will have a corresponding BrailleCell model instance. USED INTERNALLY BY SIMULATOR.
    Author:
    Team 6, EECS 2031

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean[] pinStates
      pinStates boolean array that stores the states of each pin.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BrailleCell()
      Initializes a BrailleCell instance with all pins initially down.
